titleInfo.title: Jerdine v. United States of America

name.namePart: United States District Court Northern District of Ohio

extension.cause: 28:2241 Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus (federa

titleInfo.title: Jerdine v. United States of America
titleInfo.subTitle: Memorandum Opinion and Order that the petition is Denied and this action is dismissed pursuant to U.S.C. section 2243. The court certifies, pursuant to 28 U.S.C. section 1915(a)(3), that an appeal from this decision could not be taken in good faith. As this actionis dismissed, all of Mr. Jerdine's attendant filings are denied as moot including Official, Actual, Constructive, and Express Notice of Unclean Hands and Fraud, to any and all Agents, Officers, Employees and Attorneys of local, State or Federal Governments. (Doc. 2), Notice of Affidavit of Expatriation (Doc. 4), Petition to Expedite Petitioner's Dismissal of District Court Indictment in Case No. 1:08cr481 Affirmative Assertion of Speedy Trial Rights (Doc. 6), Supplemental Expedited Emergency Petition's First Amended Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus Pursuant to 28 U.S.C. section 2241 (Doc. 7) re 8 Notice filed by Anthony L. Jerdine, 9 Motion for Issuance of Subpoenas filed by Anthony L. Jerdine, 7 Supplement filed by Anthony L. Jerdine, 1 Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus (2241) filed by Anthony L. Jerdine, 5 Supplement filed by Anthony L. Jerdine. Judge Lesley Wells on 1/16/09. (E,P)

extension.docketText: Memorandum Opinion and Order that the petition is Denied and this action is dismissed pursuant to U.S.C. section 2243. The court certifies, pursuant to 28 U.S.C. section 1915(a)(3), that an appeal from this decision could not be taken in good faith. As this actionis dismissed, all of Mr. Jerdine's attendant filings are denied as moot including Official, Actual, Constructive, and Express Notice of Unclean Hands and Fraud, to any and all Agents, Officers, Employees and Attorneys of local, State or Federal Governments.
